name: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei! Vulcan Horuseus
storyline: Gingka finds Galaxy Pegasus and a mysterious blader appears. His name is Masamune and he wants to fight. After the victory we get to the qualifying match at the World Championship. Gingka collects the team from Yu Tendo, Masamune and Tsubasa. Together they travel the world in order to defeat other teams.
summary: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei Vulcan Horuseus is an Action game, developed by Amble and published by Takara Tomy, which was released in Japan in 2010.
